A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found the humour distasteful (example: dribbling blue milk Luke)\, the politics dubious (example: Why does the whitest male member of the resistance inherit leadership from Leia when she's healthy and able?) and the continuity poor (example: If Rey is nobody\, how come Kylo Ren had heard \"so much\" about her in episode XII?). Marks for acting and production\, but this is rather a mess at the best of times..
